values: I've decided to make this bastard all private like, simply because its a whim of my paranoia. So yeah, if you for some sick reason read this, or made me your friend and I didn't notice, or whatever, and want to continue to do so, smack me upside the head and tell me. Or leave a comment. Whichever you like more.

Life is throwing too much at me too fast. I just can't do everything anymore. I'm very unbalanced, and I'm pushing myself too hard.

I'm also facing issues of Faith. I don't know what I believe anymore. I know that you can have God without Religion, and Faith without God, but what do you have if you have no Faith? You have nothing. Even Atheism is a kind of Faith. But I don't even have that. My "beliefs" on life being energy are ringing, at least to my ears, as the bull shit they are. I just don't know what to believe.

I just have to get over it, I guess. What doesn't kill me, makes me stronger.




What happens if all of this does kill me?

CREATE YOUR OWN! - or - GET PAID TO TAKE SURVEYS!

The last couple of weeks have fucking sucked. I'm emotionally and physically exhausted. I can't do much more of this. Even my force of will can run out.

I hit a cat today. Thats almost more than I can take. I felt so bad for a flash, and then I closed down emotionally. I think if I hadn't, bad things would have happened.

Yeah, I want a Mac Mini. Well, ideally, I want a G5. Those things are....uber. But a Mac Mini is pretty nice. And I could set it on top of my PC and use a switch to run them out of the same monitor and keyboard.

Talk about nerdy.

Well, I made a massive update in my Xanga, but it was mostly philosophical stuff. So I think I'm going to delve into emotional type stuff here, away from certain prying eyes.

Right now, I'm just really confused. I just don't understand my emotions. I'm not even used to having them. Somehow the walls built around my heart of been penetrated.

I need to figure some stuff out. I need to figure out what is going on in my head, I think. Alas, my abilities with logic and reason won't help, so I'm at a loss.

Someone should just shoot me.

update...update....ummm....

quiting my current job. Hired at a beter job. Depression. Avoiding self-harm, in a physical sense, from sheer stubbornness. Confused about how I feel about Megan, if I feel about Megan, although I am attracted to her. I think. Completly in the dark abou her feelings.

Rush pwns my soul.

Fuck this. Fuck everything.

Not really. I'm not in that bad of a mood. Yet.

.....I wish I understood her.

.....I wish I understood me.

.....fuck.....

no rest for the wicked. I have to press on, and hope I don't die from stress.

I'm in a rather good mood today. Maybe its just knowing that I stand where I thought I stood, and its a good place. I don't know.

Evidently, my eyes don't have a definate color. ^.^

I have nothing yet planned for tomorrow night or saturday night, and I doubt anything is goig to come up tomorrow night. Tch. Oh well.

Thats about it for now, I guess.

I'm having a hard time staying in a good mood of late, although its still easy to fake it. The more I think about what Adrian said, the more angry I get.

I had a rough night last night, and today wasn't a lot better in some aspects.

The headaches are getting more random, although I've noticed that they're related to when I think stressful things. And I had a random nosebleed today. That sucked. -.-

"I'm due for a miracle
I'm waiting for a sign
I'll stare straight
into the sun
and I won't close my eyes"

....

....

I think I might have found my miracle. Maybe I'll stop staring at the sun.

I'm getting my harddrive back tomorrow. Hopefully I'll have the fucker running soon. Thats a good thing.

So, I saw Hot Cross with Melt Banana on thursday. It was fucking awesome. I love Hot Cross. Friday was fun, even though she, again, didn't collect papers. *sigh*

Saturday was many things. We had band practice, and I felt tension the entire time, and I know why. And what Adrian said to me is really pissing me off, although not so bad since I talked to David. Thanks man.

After practice, I took Megan out to see The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. It's an excellent movie. I highly recommend it.

Good things are happening between Megan and I, even if I have no idea as to what they are. But I don't think that matters, so much, because I really like her, and I'm just going to go off of that. Yes. That is what I shall do.

Adrian can go fuck himself if he doesn't like that.

Jenn, you should email me your cell phone number so I can call you. Scratch that, I'll email you mine. You call me. ^.^

so yeah, my computer is fucked. Again. *sigh* I can fix it tomorrow. Then its crunch time for the paper. Again. -.- Ah well.

Thats about it for now.

yeah, so last night was weird. I don't know that its over yet, though. *sigh* We'll see.

I have a Xanga now, although, technically, I've had it for a bit now.

http://www.xanga.com/home.aspx?user=FailedSense

its pretty much the same angsty crap as this one. I don't know why you'd want to read it.

so, I put my newest writing in my deviantArt account.

http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/17635526/

yeah, I'm bored, so I'm stealing a thingy that has been stolen many a time before me. Enjoy.

1. What does your LJ username mean?
its the name of a rather violent character from a videogame.

2. Elaborate on your default icon?
its meganman. I animated it myself.

3. Did you lie about your age anywhere on the net?
tch. Lie about my age. What a joke.

4. How many LJ friends do you have?
a few here and there.

5. What is your current status?
That is a very complicated question. The answer is _____.

6. What are you wearing right now?
blue jeans and my Pinky and the Brain t-shirt.

7. What is life to you?
a pain in the ass, with a few good points here and there.

8. What is love to you?
up to now its been nothing but pain. Maybe I'll give it another chance.

9. What kind of people do you hate most?
they know who they are

10. What type of people do you like most?
they also know who they are

11. What makes you happy?
the band, a few people

12. Are you musically inclined?
I can sing/scream, and I can level the band like its nobodies business.

13. What would you do if you woke up one morning and found out that the person you love most didn't exist or was killed?
......ask me that again, and I'll kill you.

14. If you could go back in time and change one thing what would it be?
I wouldn't. The past is critical to me being me today, and as much as I hate myself, I wouldn't change a thing.

15. If you MUST be an animal for ONE day what would it be?
I would be a fucking Platypus.

16. Ever had a near death experience?
Yes. Too many.

17. Name ONE obvious personality quality you have?
an obvious one? I'm an ass hole.

18. What's the name of the song that's stuck in your head right now?
ashopedies - legions bow to a faceless god

19. Are you happy today?
yes and no. I'm happyish with life, but I hate myself.

Seriously, I really don't need all this "I told you so" crap. I know you guys just care, but I'm edgy. Its mostly because of this fucking room, as it just soaks up my extra stress, of which there is plently, but please, no more.

So, I did a lot of thinking tonight. Wondering about the waste that is the last two and a half years of my life. I spent all that time hardening my heart, locking away all my feelings...

I don't know. I just know that if I fuck this up.....nevermind. I'm not going to think about it.

Cleaned my room today. I'm waiting for Andrew to call so I can find out if we're playing DnD tonight, or what.

I like Silverstein. I don't know why, they aren't lyrical geniuses or anything, but I like them a lot.

I've been listening to a lot of depressing music lately, but it isn't because I'm depressed. I'm actually quite happy with my life at the moment. Well, parts of it. My car is still trying to fuck me over, and pretty much succeeding, and I still need a new job, but you'll have that. I still manage to be happy, because I have a reason to be happy. I'm feeling things that I never thought I'd feel again. I look back on the last two and a half years.....but you know, I probably needed that. I wouldn't be me without all that depression, cutting, etc. Forged in the fires of Pain, as it were. I definatly found someone worth waiting for, though. Worth that and so much more.

So, those of you that know me, you're probably wondering were all the sentimentalness is coming from. Well, believe it or not, I have a romantic side. I thought I had killed it, but I guess not. Thats life, I guess.

So, today was interesting. Visited Megan at her art sale, randomly, because I got called off work today, so I decided to do that rather than go to band practice. Ended up spending pretty much all day with her, even if 5 hours of that was asleep. We talked a lot, too.

Interesting is the correct word.

My head hurts. I think I'm going to go get something for it, and try to sleep, even though I doubt I'll have to work tomorrow.

I have the most interesting relationship with Megan. Its not a relationship in the boyfriend/girlfriend sense, just a relationship of two close friends. We have an interesting way of flirting, that anyone else wouldn't know was flirting if they saw it.

And she makes it harder to leave her place than it already is. *sigh* Maybe one day she'll desire something serious again. Maybe not. I know where she's coming from, though, and I know the whys and wherefores. *shrug*

I still have my headache. Which sucks. And my english professor didn't collect that fucking paper. What the hell. >.<

God, I am so tired. And I'm not done with this damn paper that I have to turn in later today. I'm getting the radiator in my car replaced tomorrow. Fucking car.

List of physical problems from the last week, in order of occurance:

Blood pouring out of nose.
Headache, loss of some vision in left eye, twitchy hot/cold ness
More headache, random dizziness, twitchy leg

Doesn't that sound like a good time? I love my life. -.-

I did go to a concert tonight, and it was okay. But it helped some with stress.

I am perched on the very edge of breaking. Tonight the insides of my arms were itching like they do when I feel the need to cut. It was a close thing, but I managed to not do it. Thank you, Megan. I don't know how well I would have handled that mess had you not been online.

I don't know how tomorrow will go. We'll see, but I need a fucking break so bad. I wonder if I can get out of going home.....

So. Mary is indeed pissed at me still, and just being nice to me because I'm friends with most of her friends.

That entails the good news of the day.

Thats good news because it means I was right. I think I'm going to attempt to patch up that relationship, but I doubt if I will be successful. I don't know how that makes me feel. Somewhere between crying and screaming.

I had a horrible day today, mostly. I had a horrible headache, took two Excedrin, and then it got worse. I was able to push it away for my math exam, mostly by burning out everything in my head. Its this neat thing I read in this fiction series I'm reading, and I didn't think it would work, but it did. Which was cool.

My car has decided to fuck me again. I hate it. Something related to the cooling system isn't working right, so I don't know if its going to explode or not. I hate it so fucking much.

The Arcade Fire is a wonderful band. They're trying to make me feel better. I don't know if its working.

Maybe I'll just pull out the wonderful solution of slicing up my arms tonight. *sigh*

Just when things start to go well for me, they go right back down the shitter. I don't know how many more years of this shit I can take, but its not going to be many.

Okay, here is a real update, I suppose.

Friday night was cool, there was talking and bonding and wondering about the color of my eyes.

Saturday was cool, we started multi-track recording, which is such a pain in the ass, but it was fun to hang out with Nathan, Zack, Adrian, and Justin. Mary was there, too, but I don't know how I feel about that. Megan stopped by, too, but that was to give Adrian some book of stuff she had written, and she told him to let no other touch it, so I didn't touch it. Hell, I didn't even think about touching it. I saw the look in her eyes. *shrug* the way I see it, if she wants me to know, she'll tell me.

Speaking of Mary, I have to email her and see what the fuck is going on with her being all buddy-buddy lately. Its just weird.

Sunday, we played DnD, and I created Fayde the Splatterer. He is a veritable killing machine. My new favorite character.

Monday I got to service a high pressure pump, and because of that, I got to go to my math class all greasy. It was awesome.

Today was......well, kinda boring.

Descartes was a fucking genius, though. So was Hobbes.

I am by far one of the luckiest people alive. Yeah. Definatly.

I don't feel like elaborating right now. I'm lazy.

I saw Sin City tonight. I really liked it. It was pretty cool. So gruesome and twisted.....Elijah Wood's character is fucking awesome. Psycho silent cannibal killers are the fucking best.

I didn't get to see Megen tonight, which means I didn't get to talk to her. Which means........yeah. Fuck. Not that it matters, because I'm sofucking awkward with words that I'd just end up fucking it up. I mean, why can' I just fucking tell her that.........fuck. It doesn't matter.


I like alexisonfire. good band.

So, we got kicked off the stage at the mormon thingy. We're just too hardcore for the mormons. Which, as my brother pointed out, is silly, because we aren't even a hardcore band.  But we got a bunch of fans out of it. Which is cool. We've already sold several cds, even though they don't exist yet. Which will be remedied next weekend, as we got multi-track recording up and operational. Which is fucking badass.

And I guess Mary doesn't hate me anymore, although no one should quote me on that. *shrug*

Tomorrow is DnD day, and I get to hang out with Megen, hopefully. We'll see what happens

Oh how I love math rock.

If you don't know what that is, listen to Hot Cross, then Fear Before the March of Flames. Fear Before is much more mathy than Hot Cross, but both fucking pwn. And if you like Hot Cross, check out Saetia. Saetia came first, but they aren't together anymore, and Hot Cross is what remains.

Okay, I have barn duty to do, and I have to clean the bathtub. SO I get to get high of bleach fumes. Yay. -.- Its no wonder my fucking brain doesn't work right. Between rocking out harder than the rest of the band put together and bleach fumes......-.-

Yay for Fear Before the March of Flames. Thats all I have to say about that.

So, I haven't updating this thing for a bit.

Playing a show this saturday is our next show, although a Mormon function isn't really the best venue...but its in Dublin. Thats a plus.

Zelda - The Minnish Hat is awesome.

I love the band Fall River.

Thats it.

Emily, I'm going to call you soon and we're going to have lunch. And I'm going to tell you when/where the show is so you can come see us/take pictures if you so desire. ^.~

so if I don't care what happens, why does it hurt now?







i'm a fucking mess right now. and i don't feel like using capital letters. they're irritating me for some reason.



thats it.

anyway, update. So I just got home from an awesome show at Bernie's. For those of you that don't know, Bernie's is a bar/rock club in downtown Columbus, and they have live music pretty much every night. Well, tonight, Adrian, Nathan, and I went and saw The Navies and A Day in Black and White. Good stuff. The Navies fucking owned. They played at like a million miles per hour. Good stuff. www.level-plane.com if you're curious. Thats it for now. I need to shower then go to bed, because I have to work tomorrow.

An interesting thing just happened. I can't say what just yet, but maybe soon. We'll see.

So I got called off of work today, and I got to spend the day cleaning my room. Really, that means watching Aqua Teen, but whatever. Aside of that, things are going alright. More or less. I need a new fucking job, though. My current one won't pay the bills. Not if I move out, anyway, which is the current plan for this summer. We'll see what happens.

Okay, boring crappy update, but I really don't feel like delving into emotional bullshit, because, lets face it, that shit just passes, anyway. Nothing worthwhile there.

Although I just thought of something. I need to change my shower schedule back to mornings. Which is kind of irritating, although I probably don't, really. We'll see.

Yeah, so I'm torn between the desire to do several things. I'm getting increasingly agravated at something Adrian said, which I won't relate here, because it requires too much back story. If you really, really want to know, IM me sometime.

He and I spent 10 hours yesterday working on the studio. I didn't say a word. Granted, there was a lot of nerdy euphoria, and uncapped sharpies, but still. Whatever.

I also learned something interesting, but I prefer to keep it private. If you don't like that, fuck you.

If you don't like what I just said, fuck you again.

Yes, I'm in that kind of mood right now. If you don't like it, go fuck yourself with a foot long razor blade.

I don't know why I'm in this horrible fucking mood, I had a fairly good day, I even made good progress in the sidequests in FFX. I just fucking am.

Whatever. It doesn't fucking matter, anyway. Fuck it.

"red would mean you love me, blue would mean you care"

So, the Battle of the Bands was awesome. We didn't mess up or anything. I guess the crowd really liked us, too. We got second place, even. Seeing as it was really a compition for second place, Awkward Silence being the best band there hands down, we pretty much won. ^.^ We're really happy about that. I heard something interesting too. I guess people couldn't figure out what I was on stage for, and then when In a Pendulm's Swing just tore into the heavy bit, and I started screaming, they really liked it. Which is awesome. I'm just happy we did so well. It was so much fun. There were some other really badass bands, there, too. And some really shitty ones. Fucking Shattered Existance. I really don't like them. They got third place, and I guess they were pissed. Nathan went to go congradulate them on getting third, and he heard them saying "Bullshit, bullshit, bullshit!" so he walked away. *shrug* The suck. I haven't watched the video of our show yet, but I will tomorrow.
